meanings.sent1: The magician's trick dumbfounding the audience.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display dumbfounded the children.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog dumbfounding everyone at the park.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to speak multiple languages dumbfounds me.
meanings.sent5: The sudden appearance of a rainbow after the storm was truly dumbfounding.

meanings.sent1: The dumbfounding magic show left the crowd speechless.
meanings.sent2: The view from the mountaintop was truly dumbfounding.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to open doors was dumbfounding but convenient.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of the human brain is truly dumbfounding.
meanings.sent5: The news of the lost treasure was dumbfounding to the villagers.
